name: @prosopo/captcha
author: Prosopo

scripts.hostid: npm run cmd -- "dig +short %s.prosopo.io | tail -n1 | tee /dev/tty | nslookup | cut -d = -f 2 | head -n1 | cut -d ' ' -f 2 | sed 's/\.*$//g'"
scripts.cmd:about: perform string substitution on the command and then execute it. Make sure to use --, e.g. npm run cmd -- my args here
scripts.cmd: f() { cmd=$1; shift; cmd=$(printf "$cmd" $@); echo exec: $cmd; echo; eval $cmd; }; f
scripts.build:contracts: cd protocol/dev && npm run build && npm run cli -- build --docker && cd ../..
scripts.build:typechain: npm run build:contracts && cd dev/scripts && npm run build && npm run cli -- import_all_contracts && cd ../.. && npm run lint:fix:contracts
scripts.rebuild: f() { npm run cmd -- "npm run clean %s" $@ ; npm run cmd -- "npm run build %s" $@ ;}; f
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:npm && npm run clean:ts
scripts.clean:reset: npm run clean:all && npm run clean:npm
scripts.version: f() { npm run -w @prosopo/scripts cli -- version -v $@; npm i; }; f
scripts.ws:ls: npm run --workspaces env | grep npm_package_name | cut -d '=' -f 2
scripts.ws:about: run a command for each workspace member, exiting immediately if any command fails. Don't forget the `--` !
scripts.ws: f() { set -e; npm run --silent ws:ls | while read -r line; do echo $line; npm run -w $line $@; done; }; f
scripts.setup:all: npm run deploy_protocol && npm run setup
scripts.start:all: npx concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:provider" "npm run start:demo" "npm run start:bundle" --kill-others
scripts.start:all:pow: npx concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:provider" "npm run start:demo:pow" "npm run start:bundle" --kill-others
scripts.eslint: npm run ws -- eslint && npm run eslint:workspace
scripts.prettier: npm run ws -- prettier && npm run prettier:workspace
scripts.lint: npm run -w @prosopo/scripts license && npm run ws -- lint && npm run lint:workspace
scripts.lint:cmd: f() { npm run -w @prosopo/scripts license; npm run eslint:cmd -- $@; npm run prettier:cmd -- $@; }; f
scripts.lint:workspace: npm run eslint:workspace && npm run prettier:workspace
scripts.lint:fix: FILES=$(git diff --name-status main | sed '/^[M]/!D' | awk -F ' ' '{print $2}'); echo $FILES; f() { npm run -w @prosopo/scripts license:fix; npm run eslint:fix -- $FILES; npm run prettier:fix -- $FILES; }; f
scripts.lint:fix:contracts: npm run -w @prosopo/scripts license:fix && npm -w @prosopo/captcha-contract -w @prosopo/common-contract -w @prosopo/proxy-contract run lint:fix
scripts.lint:fix:workspace: npm run eslint:fix:workspace && npm run prettier:fix:workspace
scripts.docs: npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-missing-exports --plugin typedoc-plugin-mdn-links --plugin typedoc-plugin-zod 2>&1 | grep -v "Serialized project contained a reflection" && echo 'docs.prosopo.io' >> docs/CNAME

description: Prosopo Procaptcha is a privacy-focused, secure alternative to reCAPTCHA. This repository integrates prosopo packages for development purposes.
